overview: Ronald Perkins builds an army of 14 people brainwashed through cult-like methods to protect him from his parents' killers. When Perkins is imprisoned, the police unwittingly unleash his followers on a small town and they've only got one thing on their mind: "Kill for Mr. Perkins."
tagline: Years have gone by... not heard from, nor seen. Destined to KILL. Its...
title: Perkins' 14
